<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This fix script is used to deprecate the old Saas User Subscription license metric.</description>
        <name>Deprecate SaaS User Subscription metric</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function deprecateLicenseMetric (tableName) {
	var saasUserSubscription = '96aa95cde798490da1807cee279f927c';
	var licenseMetricGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
	licenseMetricGr.addQuery('license_metric', saasUserSubscription);
	licenseMetricGr.setValue('license_metric', LicenseMetric.USER_SUBSCRIPTION);
	licenseMetricGr.setWorkflow(false);
	licenseMetricGr.updateMultiple();
}

function deprecateSaasUserSubscriptionLicenseMetric() {
	deprecateLicenseMetric('alm_license');
	if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.procurement')) {
		deprecateLicenseMetric('proc_po_item');
	}
	if (GlidePluginManager.isActive('com.snc.samp')) {
		deprecateLicenseMetric('samp_entitlement_import');
		deprecateLicenseMetric('samp_override_license_cost');
	}
	// delete the old Saas User Subscription license metric
	var licenseMetricGr = new GlideRecord('samp_sw_license_metric');
	if (licenseMetricGr.get('96aa95cde798490da1807cee279f927c')) { // old Saas User Subscription
		licenseMetricGr.deleteRecord();
	}
}

deprecateSaasUserSubscriptionLicenseMetric();]]></script>
